INSERT INTO teacher
id, userId, name, vxName, gender, primarySchool, middleSchool, highSchool, university, chinaIdNumber, personalizedSignature, address, mobile, teachingSeniority, teachingType, personalProfile, academicQualification, myStrengths, price, lifePicture,
#{id}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{vxName}, #{gender}, #{primarySchool}, #{middleSchool}, #{highSchool}, #{university}, #{chinaIdNumber}, #{personalizedSignature}, #{address}, #{mobile}, #{teachingSeniority}, #{teachingType}, #{personalProfile}, #{academicQualification}, #{myStrengths}, #{price}, #{lifePicture},
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.countAppointment from teacher a LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(*) as countAppointment,teacherId from appointment GROUP BY teacherId) b on a.userId = b.teacherId ORDER BY b.countAppointment LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offSet};
